Text:
yes! when i saw this cover, memories flooded back... it was the 1st issue of lsh i ever read, a back issue that somehow came into my possession years after it was published!

blackcanary, have you seen this week's super dinosaur 18? i'm not even gonna ask about spawn 230...

STFmaryville, Super Dinosaur #18 and Spawn #230 haven't been scanned yet.

DobisP.R. will finish up Legion of Super-Heroes v2, then v4, and then finish v3.
